comments.author: Rob
comments.body: Well, how about a dual? I'll run, you ride. Or if you want to run with me, meet at the trailhead at 12:30.

comments.author: Greg
comments.body: I also have my clunkier ride with me today and would be up for a dual. So 12:15 from TCOM and 12:30 at Gregory? -Greg

comments.author: Steve
comments.body: A duel it is!!! See you runners at the bridge at 12:30p.

comments.author: Dave
comments.body: I still haven't figured out how Dr. O'Leary cheated. I had him at the last crossing, and was up by at least 30 seconds... a sizable chunk for that part of the mountain. There was a bit of a tapdance getting around the gate through the snow, but I was back on task again in short order. By the time I hit the finish line, he was already there, rested, cooled, and dozing in the sun. Go figure. (Great run, Rob!)
